profileAlternative.summary:
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY

Self motivated, highly dependable, Leadership Professional, who succeeds in developing other people to better themselves and help companies be successful. Outstanding sales, marketing and relationship building skills motivating customers to retain, purchase and achieve goals. Strong interpersonal and written communications.

positions.title: Baker
positions.description: Increasing food sales by creating and marketing healthful snacks, soups, and lunch options for a varied cliental.

positions.title: Conservation Specialist
positions.description: Reach out to Allstate clients to inform them of the relevant facts and opinions available on their policies in an effort to encourage them to stay with Allstate when their business is at risk of leaving the company.

positions.title: Resident Assistant
positions.description: Lead a college dormitory of 36 young women by coordinating group activities, implementing discipline when necessary, serving as a role model, and communicating information in regard to dorm policies and upcoming events.

positions.title: Food Server
positions.description:
Server
Coordinated food & drink orders in a timely manner, transact financial exchanges, and provide excellent customer service for 8-40 customers at one time.

given.text:
Stephanie was the manager at Nu Vibe Juice and Java where I worked from 2009 to 2010. We worked together on a daily basis. During that time Stephanie took pride and responsibility for her work by consistently going beyond the expectations of her job. She was the first to arrive, regularly worked after her scheduled shift, and often volunteered to help a co-worker cover their shift when a conflict arose. She made the effort to get to know her customers personally which allowed them to feel valued and appreciated. Even when dealing with difficult customers, she was always respectful, understanding, and quick to address their complaints. I would highly recommend Stephanie for any position, as she is fully committed to her work and brings passion and creativity in all that she accomplishes.
